product_overview: Nim is a highly interactive personal website template built with modern web technologies like Next.js 15, React 19, and Tailwind CSS v4. It integrates advanced UI animations, 3D WebGL content, and an MDX-powered blog system to offer a rich, dynamic online presence for personal portfolios, blogs, and projects.
core_goals: Provide a visually appealing, interactive personal website template for developers and designers.
Enable easy content management through structured data and MDX for blogs.
Deliver a scalable and performant architecture using modern React and Next.js features.
Incorporate advanced animation and 3D graphics for unique user experiences.
Support responsive design and accessibility with theme switching and keyboard controls.
Ensure robust analytics integration for user engagement tracking.
key_features: Advanced Audio Player Component with script drawer and keyboard controls.
Interactive Video Player Components with hover effects and custom controls.
Dynamic Project Management System featuring random project selection, video thumbnails, and detailed project pages.
Sophisticated Animation System using Motion for UI transitions and effects.
3D WebGL Components powered by Three.js and React Three Fiber.
Rich Interactive UI Components including carousels, accordions, and morphing dialogs.
Text Effects System with animations such as scrambling, morphing, and circular text.
MDX-based Blog System with custom components and structured metadata support.
Newsletter Subscription with API integration for user sign-ups.
Comprehensive Analytics Integration through Vercel and Google Analytics.
Responsive Navigation System with theme switching capabilities.
Visual Effects like spotlight and border trails for UI enhancement.
Portfolio Archive System supporting filtering and categorization.
Page Generation for SEO, metadata, and icon handling.
Dedicated Case Study Pages with rich content and animations.
Personal About Page System showcasing biography and work experience.
Visual Progress Tracking with scroll indicators.
Testing Infrastructure using Jest and React Testing Library.
Core UI Library built on Radix UI primitives for foundational components.
user_flow_summary: User visits the landing page and navigates through the responsive header to explore projects, blog posts, or the about page.
Users interact with multimedia components like audio and video players with keyboard and hover controls.
Content creators add or update projects, blog posts (via MDX), and work experience through structured data files.
Newsletter subscribers enter their email and submit via the newsletter signup form which integrates with backend APIs.
Users read blog posts rendered with custom MDX components and navigate between posts.
Visitors explore project showcases that feature dynamic video thumbnails and detailed pages with animations and 3D elements.
Theme switching toggles between light and dark modes affecting the entire site UI.
Analytics capture visitor interactions to provide insights on user engagement and performance.
validation_criteria: All interactive media components (audio, video, 3D) function smoothly with keyboard and hover control support.
MDX blog posts render correctly with custom components and metadata.
Theme switching works without causing layout or styling issues across all supported pages.
Newsletter subscription form validates email input and successfully handles API responses.
Project pages load dynamic content as expected with randomized selections and video thumbnails.
Responsive navigation works properly on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
Animations and 3D effects perform well without significant frame drops or performance issues.
API routes for newsletter subscription have appropriate error handling and testing coverage.
Automated tests cover core components and integrations ensuring regressions are caught early.
SEO metadata and structured data are present and correct on all pages for optimal indexing.
